normalized: the next moment――
on the rooftop of the mishima tower,a 54 story, 248 meter tall building.
in the extravagant salon of the penthouse,something strange is happening.
at the center of the room, tiny lightning flashes surge from nowhere.
an instant later, they swell into an actual explosion.
the windows shatter.
as a strong wind rushes in, a shimmering orb emerges.
a thunderous roar accompanies it.
a blinding flare engulfs the room.
after it fades, where the sphere used to be,ground and furnitures are cleanly gouged out.
three people now stand there―― yukikaze, rinko and tatsurou.
the sudden turn of events leaves the salon's residents dumbfounded.
the 10 burly men who guard them are also surprised.

name: guards
normalized: taimanin!?
」「it's a taimanin attack!
still, as expected from professional fighters.
their reaction is only slightly delayed, and as they recognizethe invaders' clothes shouts of warnings are raised.
however, that small delay proves fatal to them.

name: yukikaze
normalized: ah!
before the men ready themselves,yukikaze flies up.
like a fairy.
she's grasping two pistols in her hands.
most taimanin wield a sword in battle,but a few make use of special arms.
resembling single-shot flintlocks,the guns could be straight out of a museum.
of course, as a taimanin,there's no way she would carry such relics.
those guns do not require bullets.

name: yukikaze
normalized: come forth, lightning strike!
yukikaze's sharp voice soars in the air.
lightning wells up from her body.
the current running through her arms, fire surges from her weapons.
that fire is lightning.
dondodon!
dodododdon!
a hail of lightning bullets gushes forth from the guns' muzzles.
instead of gunfire, thunder resonates with each shot.
the lightning bullets burrow deep in the guards' bodies.
they dont even have time to feel pain,as the projectiles burst inside their flesh.
500 volts course through their muscles and rend them apart.
in the blink of an eye, the ten people guarding the roomare turned into chunky salsa.
from time immemorial, thunder is said to be the gods' own voices.
it is as if taimanin yukikaze's immense might proves that.
remaining is a dark skinned old man and a fat fellow in his forties.

name: old man
normalized: y-you damned taimanin…!?
cut short in the middle of his prattle,the frail elder departs for the netherworld.

name: yukikaze
normalized: target eliminated.

name: rinko
normalized: it's not over yet!
rinko interjects.
at the same time, the other guards in the penthouseburst into the room.
20 of them.
moreover, their appearance has been drastically altered.
they now have the shape of lions, wolves and tiger-like monsters.
called juujin in hell, they result from the fusion of man and beast.

name: rinko
normalized: perfect, i'll cut juujin until i'm sated!
rinko soundlessly draws her katana from her waist.
74 centimeters in length, it is the ancestral bladeof the akiyama household : ishikiri kanemitsu.

name: rinko
normalized: haa!
one yell.
rinko jumps into the horde with her naked sword.
a werewolf stands at the end of her flashing strike.
as if made of smoke, the steel slips through his massive body.
without a single spray of blood,the deadly edge cuts the denizen of hell in half.

name: rinko
normalized: yaa!
after the first swing, a stream of slashes is unleashed,sending the heads of both a lion and a tiger flying.
a riposte slice through the overhead fist of a werebear.
a second later, it's a pig-like juujin that has his skull cleaved.

name: rinko
normalized: deyaa!
ishikiri kanemitsu's sharpness is terrifying.
even though they would shrug bullets off, the creaturesare having their flesh torn to pieces, their bones severed.
but it's nothing compared to rinko's talent.
unremitting, flowing like water,she makes her blade the brush of her own bloody painting.
in a few seconds, five demons have been dispatched.

name: rinko

aren't you going to come at me?
